# Paper

Vincent Prié, Alain Danet, Alice Valentini, Manuel Lopes-Lima, Pierre Taberlet,
Aurélien Besnard, Nicolas Roset, Olivier Gargominy, Tony Dejean (2023) Conservation
assessment based on large-scale monitoring of eDNA: Application to freshwater
mussels. Biological Conservation. (*Accepted*)

https://doi.org/10.1016/j.biocon.2023.110089

Corresponding author: Vincent Prié
Email address: prie.vincent[at]gmail.com

# Repository

The analysis used to compute the figure 4 and 5 are in [`result.Rmd`](https://github.com/alaindanet/prie_mussels/blob/main/result.Rmd).
The scripts for the methods and supplementary material are in:
[`manuscript/matmet.Rmd`](https://github.com/alaindanet/prie_mussels/blob/main/manuscript/matmet.Rmd) and [`manuscript/supplementary.Rmd`](https://github.com/alaindanet/prie_mussels/blob/main/manuscript/supplementary.Rmd).

The mussel data are available at the [INPN](www.inpn.mnhn.fr).
